problems.title: Check Anagram
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given two strings S1 and S2, check if they are anagrams of each other.
Two strings are anagrams if they contain the same characters with the same frequencies.

Return "True" if they are anagrams, else "False".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
listen silent

Sample Output
True

Explanation:
Both strings contain the same characters.

Sample Input
hello world

Sample Output
False
problems.constraints:
1 <= |S1|, |S2| <= 10^5
S1 and S2 consist of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Or use a frequency array/hash map to count characters.
